about_the_game:
This Be Mutiny is a turn-based strategy game about treasure, romance, and betrayal.

You and your crew of swashbuckling pirates are on an epic treasure hunt - until it devolves into mutiny. But if you can survive the backstabbings and betrayals, the treasure will be yours!!!

  • Treasure - Work through a series of heists to lead you to the long lost treasure.
  • Romance - Get to know your crew mates along your adventures.
  • Betrayal - But be ready: at the end of each heist, your pirates will inevitably betray you.
